fabindia's natural, craft-based pieces pay tribute to small business artisans in rural India.   This earthy stole perfectly captures the traditional mood of the moment with its creative patterning. The fabric's qualities result from the traditional method of sizing and hand weaving - techniques passed on to the artisans from generation to generation. Chanderi fabric is renowned for its very fine gossamer quality, placement of motifs and design intricacy, and has been the chosen fabric for saris produced for the royalty. Twist it into a stylish knot or wrap it around your shoulders and feel the luxe fabric on your skin.
